content: Ok, so where do I need to put the ssh key so that the script finds it? Ideally, it could just be a placeholder in the script for simplicity or if you tell me the format and file name, I can save it in claude-dc-docker/ directory. He uses SSH only. I'd want him to use the requirements.txt file he created that we modified located in the repository at palios-taey-nova/claude-dc-implementation/requirements.txt
